title: New API Model Sync
description: Automatically synchronize models for all channels within the same New API site

settings.title: Model Sync Settings
settings.enableDesc: Automatically sync models at specified intervals
settings.concurrencyDesc: Number of channels to process in parallel (recommend 1-3 to avoid rate limits)
settings.maxRetriesDesc: Maximum automatic retry attempts on failure
settings.requestsPerMinuteDesc: Rate limit: maximum number of requests per minute (recommend 10-30)
settings.burstDesc: Token bucket size: allowed burst requests before throttling
settings.viewExecutionDesc: View detailed execution results and trigger manual syncs

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search by channel name, ID, or error message...

empty.noDataDesc: Click "Run All" to start synchronizing all channels
empty.noResultsDesc: Try adjusting your filters or search query
empty.configWarningDesc: Please configure New API base URL, admin token, and user ID before running model sync

error.configMissing: Please configure New API settings first
error.noSelection: Please select at least one channel
